projects.description: The main goal was to keep the Feedzai websites up and running (feedzai.com / research.feedzai.com / careers.feedzai.com), create pages for events, resources, etc. Alongside a team of designers and another developer, we developed and created the new Feedzai Careers website.

I worked on the creation of websites for the company's events, using WordPress and other tools. I worked on several WordPress development projects, creating custom templates from the ground up and in other projects with drag and drop themes. I managed several websites at once, ensuring smooth running and maintenance. I co-ordinated email marketing campaigns and scheduled the email sending times and filter contacts. I used OBS to enable live streaming to sites like YouTube, Facebook and LinkedIn, for numerous events. I designed and built interfaces using Adobe XD, implementing creative solutions for websites using assets provided by collaborating design agencies

Marketing and Advertising - creation of designs for the company's property screens and advertisements for media using Illustrator and InDesign. Creation of microsites for properties using Dreamweaver (HTML5 and CSS3). ExactTarget (Assembly and analysis) - the company's email marketing platform. Proposals in InDesign - for the sale and lease of properties. Capturing images at corporate events.
